text: Scott City is an extinct town in Atchison County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. The GNIS classifies it as a populated place, but the precise location of the town site is unknown. Scott City had the name of its founder, Margaret Scott. A variant name was North Star. A post office called North Star was established in 1857, and remained in operation until 1874. ==References== Category:Ghost towns in Missouri Category:Former populated places in Atchison County, Missouri Category:1857 establishments in Missouri
title: Scott City, Atchison County, Missouri
